# Calibration
Calibration is updating the axis limits to accommodate the graph. 
By default, it is **enabled for the y-axes** and **disabled for the x-axis**.
It can by toggled on/off by using the appropriate `allowCalibration` label.

## Getting Started

- Install with [npmjs](https://www.npmjs.com):
  - `npm i @cerner/carbon-graphs --save-dev`

## Usage
```js
import Carbon from '@cerner/carbon-graphs';
import '@cerner/carbon-graphs/dist/css/carbon-graphs.css';
```

## Examples

<AllowCalibrationEnabledY/>

<AllowCalibrationDisabledY/>

<AllowCalibrationDisabledX/>

<AllowCalibrationEnabledX/>

<AllowCalibrationDisabledXTimeseries/>

<AllowCalibrationEnabledXTimeseries/>
